items.title: U.S. Public Library Buildings Are In Poor Condition, Per a New Government Report
items.description: The Government Accountability Office has released a report on the status of public library buildings nationwide, and the results are not great.

items.title: A Silver Lining From Comic Book Burnings and Censorship in Postwar America: Book Censorship News, December 19, 2025
items.description: While comic books remain among the most challenged and banned formats in the US, there are some silver linings to be seen.

items.title: The Most Popular Books In US Public Libraries in 2025
items.description: What were the most popular books checked out in US libraries in 2025? Here are the top fiction and nonfiction titles across 40 libraries.

items.description: The best books writer Kendra W. has gifted her spouse include stories of the Great Migration and even tales of pirates on the high seas.

items.title: The Most Read Books on Goodreads This Week
items.description: Here are the five most-read books on Goodreads this week! These are the buzziest books of the moment, from thrillers to holiday romances.
